author: 0xblacktemplar
content:
This seems to be an issue with the docker version of the deposit-cli. When I directly download the binary it works.

This are the steps I did using docker:
1. Clone the repository: `git clone https://github.com/ethereum/staking-deposit-cli.git`
2. build the docker image: `make build_docker`
3. run the docker image: `docker run -it --rm -v $(pwd)/validator_keys:/app/validator_keys ethereum/staking-deposit-cli new-mnemonic --chain=kiln --eth1_withdrawal_address=xxx --num_validators=1 --mnemonic_language=english`
